profile.name: Andrew White
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Delivering scalable and efficient software solutions at Unboxed
profile.summary: Results-driven software engineer with a passion for building high-quality, maintainable applications. With over 5 years of experience in Ruby on Rails development, I've worked on numerous projects, from open-source gems to enterprise-level applications.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Led the development of multiple high-traffic web applications using Ruby on Rails and MySQL.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement scalable architecture solutions.
Mentored junior engineers and contributed to the growth of the team.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple web applications using Ruby on Rails, MySQL, and Tailwind CSS.
Contributed to open-source projects such as capybara and govuk-coronavirus-vulnerable-people-form.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained multiple open-source gems, including textacular and delayed_job_active_record.
Contributed to the development of thor and rspec-rails.
